name: KIT109 2020 Exam Game
description:
Click and hold to shoot.

Turbo for (limited) speed boost with Space bar.

Reach the goal to win.

Use 1-9 keys to auto-switch between levels:

  1. Normal Controls
  2. Black Holes
  3. Maze and Cinemachine
  4. Breakable Door
  5. Checkpoints
  6. Tripwire Door
  7. Sticky Walls
  8. Homing Missiles
  9. Free Choice (not implemented in this demo)
  10. Free Choice (not implemented in this demo)

Press R to return to main menu at any time.

Music from Party Golf by George Begbie http://www.georgebegbie.com/

Black hole spritesheet by Cethiel from https://opengameart.org/content/cosmic-time-magic-effect used under CC0 Public Domain license.

Level sprites using 2D SpriteShape component by Unity, using sprites from the "2D SpriteShape Extras" package: https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.2d.spriteshape@3.0/manual/index.html
